animeTitle: Ancient Martial Artist in the City
otherNames: 古武高手在都市, Kongfu Master in the City
synopsis: King Lu Guoguo was poisoned and his life was at stake. His son Lu Chen, who had been missing for 5 years, came back strong. He changed his character from the past and turned into a powerful and rich existence. I saw him effortlessly. Saving Lu Guo from Water and Fire “My Master is Super Fierce”
